name: Monochrome (Hush Games)
description:
Two Witches, Two different worlds, both lost memory of who they are, all  they know is they have to work together to get back home and reveal their identities.

This is my submission for the United Game Jam 2020, I worked on this for 2 Days, The theme of the game jam was "Two"

I interpret the theme by the Two Witches which you are able to switch control of. (And also the two main colors, Black and White :D)

If you encounter any bugs let me know in the comments :D  any feedback is appreciated!

Spritesheet:

https://arks.itch.io/witchcraft-spritesheet

I hope you enjoy the game :D
